text:
Tilo Prückner (26 October 1940 – 2 July 2020) was a German actor. His career lasted for over fifty years and more than 100 movies. He was born in Augsburg, Germany. He was known for his roles in "The NeverEnding Story", "Iron Sky" and "Tatort".
Prückner died on 2 July 2020 from heart failure at a Berlin hospital, aged 79.
